name: irma-web-frontend
description: Styling to simplify and standardize the IRMA login flow

scripts.clean: npm run clear && npm run fonts && npm run copy-screenshot && npm run rebuild
scripts.svg-images: echo "// This file is auto-generated from the images directory, so don't bother manually changing it." > stylesheets/variables/svg-images.scss; for file in images/*; do [ -e "$file" ] || continue; svgo=`svgo "$file" -o -`; name=`basename "$file" .svg`; echo "\$svg-image-$name: '$svgo';" >> stylesheets/variables/svg-images.scss; done
scripts.dev: npm run clean && concurrently --kill-others "npm run watch-stylesheets" "npm run watch-fonts" "npm run watch-images" "npm run serve"
scripts.release: sass stylesheets/index.scss dist/irma-web-frontend.css && uglifycss --output dist/irma-web-frontend.min.css dist/irma-web-frontend.css && cp -r fonts dist/
